verses.verse: And Joshua<WH3091> gathered<WH622> <WH853> all<WH3605> the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> to Shechem,<WH7927> and called<WH7121> for the elders<WH2205> of Israel,<WH3478> and for their heads,<WH7218> and for their judges,<WH8199> and for their officers;<WH7860> and they presented themselves<WH3320> before<WH6440> God.<WH430>

And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> unto<WH413> all<WH3605> the people,<WH5971> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> Your fathers<WH1> dwelt<WH3427> on the other side<WH5676> of the flood<WH5104> in old time,<WH4480> <WH5769> even Terah,<WH8646> the father<WH1> of Abraham,<WH85> and the father<WH1> of Nachor:<WH5152> and they served<WH5647> other<WH312> gods.<WH430>

And I took<WH3947> <WH853> your father<WH1> <WH853> Abraham<WH85> from the other side<WH4480> <WH5676> of the flood,<WH5104> and led<WH1980> him throughout all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> and multiplied<WH7235> <WH853> his seed,<WH2233> and gave<WH5414> him<WH853> Isaac.<WH3327>

And I gave<WH5414> unto Isaac<WH3327> <WH853> Jacob<WH3290> and Esau:<WH6215> and I gave<WH5414> unto Esau<WH6215> <WH853> mount<WH2022> Seir,<WH8165> to possess<WH3423> it; but Jacob<WH3290> and his children<WH1121> went down<WH3381> into Egypt.<WH4714>

I sent<WH7971> <WH853> Moses<WH4872> also and Aaron,<WH175> and I plagued<WH5062> <WH853> Egypt,<WH4714> according to that which<WH834> I did<WH6213> among<WH7130> them: and afterward<WH310> I brought you out.<WH3318> <WH853>

And I brought your fathers out<WH3318> <WH853> <WH1> of Egypt:<WH4480> <WH4714> and ye came<WH935> unto the sea;<WH3220> and the Egyptians<WH4714> pursued<WH7291> after<WH310> your fathers<WH1> with chariots<WH7393> and horsemen<WH6571> unto the Red<WH5488> sea.<WH3220>

And when they cried<WH6817> unto<WH413> the LORD,<WH3068> he put<WH7760> darkness<WH3990> between<WH996> you and the Egyptians,<WH4713> and brought<WH935> <WH853> the sea<WH3220> upon<WH5921> them, and covered<WH3680> them; and your eyes<WH5869> have seen<WH7200> <WH853> what<WH834> I have done<WH6213> in Egypt:<WH4714> and ye dwelt<WH3427> in the wilderness<WH4057> a long<WH7227> season.<WH3117>

And I brought<WH935> you into<WH413> the land<WH776> of the Amorites,<WH567> which dwelt<WH3427> on the other side<WH5676> Jordan;<WH3383> and they fought<WH3898> with<WH854> you: and I gave<WH5414> them into your hand,<WH3027> that ye might possess<WH3423> <WH853> their land;<WH776> and I destroyed<WH8045> them from before<WH4480> <WH6440> you.

Then Balak<WH1111> the son<WH1121> of Zippor,<WH6834> king<WH4428> of Moab,<WH4124> arose<WH6965> and warred<WH3898> against Israel,<WH3478> and sent<WH7971> and called<WH7121> Balaam<WH1109> the son<WH1121> of Beor<WH1160> to curse<WH7043> you:
But I would<WH14> not<WH3808> hearken<WH8085> unto Balaam;<WH1109> therefore he blessed<WH1288> <WH1288> you still: so I delivered<WH5337> you out of his hand.<WH4480> <WH3027>

And ye went over<WH5674> <WH853> Jordan,<WH3383> and came<WH935> unto<WH413> Jericho:<WH3405> and the men<WH1167> of Jericho<WH3405> fought<WH3898> against you, the Amorites,<WH567> and the Perizzites,<WH6522> and the Canaanites,<WH3669> and the Hittites,<WH2850> and the Girgashites,<WH1622> the Hivites,<WH2340> and the Jebusites;<WH2983> and I delivered<WH5414> them into your hand.<WH3027>

And I sent<WH7971> <WH853> the hornet<WH6880> before<WH6440> you, which drove them out<WH1644> <WH853> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> you, even the two<WH8147> kings<WH4428> of the Amorites;<WH567> but not<WH3808> with thy sword,<WH2719> nor<WH3808> with thy bow.<WH7198>

And I have given<WH5414> you a land<WH776> for which<WH834> ye did not<WH3808> labor,<WH3021> and cities<WH5892> which<WH834> ye built<WH1129> not,<WH3808> and ye dwell<WH3427> in them; of the vineyards<WH3754> and oliveyards<WH2132> which<WH834> ye planted<WH5193> not<WH3808> do ye<WH859> eat.<WH398>

Now therefore<WH6258> fear<WH3372> <WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> and serve<WH5647> him in sincerity<WH8549> and in truth:<WH571> and put away<WH5493> <WH853> the gods<WH430> which<WH834> your fathers<WH1> served<WH5647> on the other side<WH5676> of the flood,<WH5104> and in Egypt;<WH4714> and serve<WH5647> ye<WH853> the LORD.<WH3068>

And if<WH518> it seem evil<WH7489> unto you<WH5869> to serve<WH5647> <WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> choose<WH977> you this day<WH3117> <WH853> whom<WH4310> ye will serve;<WH5647> whether<WH518> <WH853> the gods<WH430> which<WH834> your fathers<WH1> served<WH5647> that<WH834> were on the other side<WH5676> of the flood,<WH5104> or<WH518> <WH853> the gods<WH430> of the Amorites,<WH567> in whose land<WH776> ye<WH859> dwell:<WH3427> but as for me<WH595> and my house,<WH1004> we will serve<WH5647> <WH853> the LORD.<WH3068>
And the people<WH5971> answered<WH6030> and said,<WH559> God forbid<WH2486> that we should forsake<WH4480> <WH5800> <WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> to serve<WH5647> other<WH312> gods;<WH430>

For <WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> our God,<WH430> he<WH1931> it is that brought<WH5927> us up and our fathers<WH1> out of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> from the house<WH4480> <WH1004> of bondage,<WH5650> and which<WH834> did<WH6213> those<WH428> great<WH1419> <WH853> signs<WH226> in our sight,<WH5869> and preserved<WH8104> us in all<WH3605> the way<WH1870> wherein<WH834> we went,<WH1980> and among all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> through<WH7130> whom we passed: <WH5674>

And the LORD<WH3068> drove out<WH1644> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> us<WH853> all<WH3605> the people,<WH5971> even the Amorites<WH567> which dwelt<WH3427> in the land:<WH776> therefore will we<WH587> also<WH1571> serve<WH5647> <WH853> the LORD;<WH3068> for<WH3588> he<WH1931> is our God.<WH430>

And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> unto<WH413> the people,<WH5971> Ye cannot<WH3808> <WH3201> serve<WH5647> <WH853> the LORD:<WH3068> for<WH3588> he<WH1931> is a holy<WH6918> God;<WH430> he<WH1931> is a jealous<WH7072> God;<WH410> he will not<WH3808> forgive<WH5375> your transgressions<WH6588> nor your sins.<WH2403>

If <WH3588> ye forsake<WH5800> <WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> and serve<WH5647> strange<WH5236> gods,<WH430> then he will turn<WH7725> and do you hurt,<WH7489> and consume<WH3615> you, after<WH310> that<WH834> he hath done you good.<WH3190>
And the people<WH5971> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Joshua,<WH3091> Nay;<WH3808> but<WH3588> we will serve<WH5647> <WH853> the LORD.<WH3068>

And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> unto<WH413> the people,<WH5971> Ye<WH859> are witnesses<WH5707> against yourselves that<WH3588> ye<WH859> have chosen<WH977> you<WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> to serve<WH5647> him. And they said,<WH559> We are witnesses.<WH5707>

Now <WH6258> therefore put away,<WH5493> said he, the<WH853> strange<WH5236> gods<WH430> which<WH834> are among<WH7130> you, and incline<WH5186> <WH853> your heart<WH3824> unto<WH413> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478>
And the people<WH5971> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Joshua,<WH3091> <WH853> The LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> will we serve,<WH5647> and his voice<WH6963> will we obey.<WH8085>
So Joshua<WH3091> made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with the people<WH5971> that<WH1931> day,<WH3117> and set<WH7760> them a statute<WH2706> and an ordinance<WH4941> in Shechem.<WH7927>

And Joshua<WH3091> wrote<WH3789> these<WH428> <WH853> words<WH1697> in the book<WH5612> of the law<WH8451> of God,<WH430> and took<WH3947> a great<WH1419> stone,<WH68> and set it up<WH6965> there<WH8033> under<WH8478> an oak,<WH427> that<WH834> was by the sanctuary<WH4720> of the LORD.<WH3068>

And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> unto<WH413> all<WH3605> the people,<WH5971> Behold,<WH2009> this<WH2063> stone<WH68> shall be<WH1961> a witness<WH5713> unto us; for<WH3588> it<WH1931> hath heard<WH8085> <WH853> all<WH3605> the words<WH561> of the LORD<WH3068> which<WH834> he spoke<WH1696> unto<WH5973> us: it shall be<WH1961> therefore a witness<WH5713> unto you, lest<WH6435> ye deny<WH3584> your God.<WH430>
So Joshua<WH3091> let<WH853> the people<WH5971> depart,<WH7971> every man<WH376> unto his inheritance.<WH5159>

And it came to pass<WH1961> after<WH310> these<WH428> things,<WH1697> that Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD,<WH3068> died,<WH4191> being a hundred<WH3967> and ten<WH6235> years old.<WH8141>

And they buried<WH6912> him in the border<WH1366> of his inheritance<WH5159> in Timnathserah,<WH8556> which<WH834> is in mount<WH2022> Ephraim,<WH669> on the north side<WH4480> <WH6828> of the hill<WH2022> of Gaash.<WH1608>

And Israel<WH3478> served<WH5647> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of Joshua,<WH3091> and all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of the elders<WH2205> that<WH834> overlived<WH748> <WH3117> <WH310> Joshua,<WH3091> and which<WH834> had known<WH3045> <WH853> all<WH3605> the works<WH4639> of the LORD,<WH3068> that<WH834> he had done<WH6213> for Israel.<WH3478>

And the bones<WH6106> of Joseph,<WH3130> which<WH834> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> brought up<WH5927> out of Egypt,<WH4480> <WH4714> buried<WH6912> they in Shechem,<WH7927> in a parcel<WH2513> of ground<WH7704> which<WH834> Jacob<WH3290> bought<WH7069> of<WH4480> <WH854> the sons<WH1121> of Hamor<WH2544> the father<WH1> of Shechem<WH7928> for a hundred<WH3967> pieces of silver:<WH7192> and it became<WH1961> the inheritance<WH5159> of the children<WH1121> of Joseph.<WH3130>

And Eleazar<WH499> the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> died;<WH4191> and they buried<WH6912> him in a hill<WH1389> that pertained to Phinehas<WH6372> his son,<WH1121> which<WH834> was given<WH5414> him in mount<WH2022> Ephraim.<WH669>
